social.Description: Reciprocal Social Interaction Subscore (A) total for Autism Diagnostic Interview-Revised {0..30}

verbal.Description: Abnormalities in Comunication Subscore (B) total for Autism Diagnostic Interview-Revised {0..26}

rrb.Description: Restricted, Repetitive, and Stereotyped Patterns of Behavior Subscore (C) total for Autism Diagnostic Interview-Revised {0..12}

onset.Description: Abnormalities of Development Evident at or Before 36 Months Subscore (D) total for Autism Diagnostic Interview-Revised {0..5}

reliable.Description: Was ADI scored and administered by research reliable personnel
